Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler

  • Packages that use Handler 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.http
    Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
    org.jgrapes.io
    I/O related components built on top of the core package.
    org.jgrapes.net
    Networking related I/O classes.
    org.jgrapes.util
    Utility components that are too small to deserve individual libraries/projects.

    • Uses of Handler in org.jgrapes.http

      Methods in org.jgrapes.http with annotations of type Handler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SessionManager.discard(DiscardSession event)
      Discards the given session.
      void HttpServer.onAccepted(Accepted event, IOSubchannel netChannel)
      Creates a new downstream connection as LinkedIOSubchannel of the network connection, a HttpRequestDecoder and a HttpResponseEncoder.
      void HttpServer.onClose(Close event, org.jgrapes.http.HttpServer.WebAppMsgChannel appChannel)
      Handles a close event from downstream by closing the upstream connections.
      void HttpServer.onClosed(Closed event, IOSubchannel netChannel) 
      void HttpServer.onInput(Input<ByteBuffer> event, IOSubchannel netChannel)
      Handles data from the client (from upstream).
      void HttpServer.onOptions(OptionsRequest event, IOSubchannel appChannel)
      Provides a fallback handler for an OPTIONS request with asterisk.
      void HttpServer.onOutput(Output<?> event, org.jgrapes.http.HttpServer.WebAppMsgChannel appChannel)
      Receives the message body of a response.
      void HttpServer.onRequestCompleted(Request.Completed event, IOSubchannel appChannel)
      Checks whether the request has been handled (value of Request event set to true) or the status code in the prepared response is no longer “Not Implemented”.
      void HttpServer.onResponse(Response event, org.jgrapes.http.HttpServer.WebAppMsgChannel appChannel)
      Handles a response event from downstream by sending it through an HttpResponseEncoder that generates the data (encoded information) and sends it upstream with Output events.
      void HttpServer.onWebSocketAccepted(WebSocketAccepted event, org.jgrapes.http.HttpServer.WebAppMsgChannel appChannel)
      Send the response indicating that the protocol switch was accepted and causes subsequent data to be handled as Input and Output events on the channel.
      void LanguageSelector.onWebSocketAccepted(WebSocketAccepted event, IOSubchannel channel) 
      void SessionManager.onWebSocketAccepted(WebSocketAccepted event, IOSubchannel channel)
      Associates the channel with the session from the upgrade request.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FileStorage.onClose(Close event, Channel channel) 
      void InputStreamMonitor.onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event)
      The component can be configured with events that include a path (see @link ConfigurationUpdate.paths()) that matches this components path (see Manager.path()).
      void FileStorage.onInput(Input<ByteBuffer> event, Channel channel) 
      void NioDispatcher.onNioRegistration(NioRegistration event) 
      void FileStorage.onOutput(Output<ByteBuffer> event, Channel channel) 
      void FileStorage.onSaveInput(SaveInput event)
      Opens a file for writing using the properties of the event.
      void FileStorage.onSaveOutput(SaveOutput event)
      Opens a file for writing using the properties of the event.
      void InputStreamMonitor.onStart(Start event)
      Starts a thread that continuously reads available data from the input stream.
      void NioDispatcher.onStart(Start event)
      Starts this dispatcher.
      void FileStorage.onStop(Stop event) 
      void InputStreamMonitor.onStop(Stop event)
      Stops the thread that reads data from the input stream.
      void NioDispatcher.onStop(Stop event)
      Stops the thread that is associated with this dispatcher.
      void FileStorage.onStreamFile(StreamFile event)
      Opens a file for reading using the properties of the event and streams its content as a sequence of Output events with the end of record flag set in the last event.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SslServer.onAccepted(Accepted event, IOSubchannel encryptedChannel)
      Creates a new downstream connection as LinkedIOSubchannel of the network connection together with an SSLEngine.
      void TcpServer.onClose(Close event)
      Shuts down the server or one of the connections to the server
      void SslServer.onClose(Close event, org.jgrapes.net.SslServer.PlainChannel plainChannel)
      Handles a close event from downstream.
      void SslServer.onClosed(Closed event, IOSubchannel encryptedChannel)
      Handles a close event from the encrypted channel (client).
      void TcpServer.onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event)
      The component can be configured with events that include a path (see @link ConfigurationUpdate.paths()) that matches this components path (see Manager.path()).
      void SslServer.onInput(Input<ByteBuffer> event, IOSubchannel encryptedChannel)
      Handles encrypted data from upstream (the network).
      void SslServer.onIOError(IOError event, IOSubchannel encryptedChannel)
      Handles an IOError event from the encrypted channel (client) by sending it downstream.
      void SslServer.onOutput(Output<ByteBuffer> event, org.jgrapes.net.SslServer.PlainChannel plainChannel)
      Sends decrypted data through the engine and then upstream.
      void TcpServer.onOutput(Output<ByteBuffer> event, org.jgrapes.net.TcpServer.TcpChannel channel)
      Writes the data passed in the event to the client.
      void TcpServer.onRegistered(NioRegistration.Completed event) 
      void TcpServer.onStart(Start event)
      Starts the server.
      void TcpServer.onStop(Stop event)
      Shuts down the server.
